tag_list: entrepreneur, startup, e-commerce, marketplace, emerging-market, russia, asia, online-fashion, online-travel
overview:
Hedge fund manager turned entrepreneur and truly passionate about it. Currently building the second successful start-up. Big advocate of Lean Start-up. The Product and Customer are the only main pillars, the rest is just a vanity trap.

Founder and CEO at iMall.eu, the first premium market place for western businesses to sell in emerging markets. Through its proprietary technology, iMALL seamlessly publishes the inventories of partner merchants with translated and adopted country specific content, provides 24/7 multi-lingual customer support and takes full responsibility for sales and marketing. We would like large blue chip merchants to think of us as their turnkey “Emerging markets Sales and Marketing departments”.

We are conquering Russian speaking e-commerce market now and then moving towards Asia with the army of our existing partners.

Specialties • MakeItHappen: Lean start-up, team building, fund raising, agile product development, freemium marketing • E-commerce: Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Referral, Revenues
